content:
Â« Gecko Roles Page

An object which is used to allow input of characters not found on a keyboard, such as the input of Chinese characters on a Western keyboard.

Mapped to

  • ATK: ATK_ROLE_INPUT_METHOD_WINDOW
  • UA: NSAccessibilityUnknownRole
  • MSAA: USE_ROLE_STRING
  • IA2: IA2_ROLE_INPUT_METHOD_WINDOW

Used by

Not used.
title: ROLE_IME
